name: Metavie
description: Metavie token is a metaverse utility token. It can be earned through DeFi products like the Superfarm and the Vault Packs. The Metavie Token is then used as an Access Token to unlock more areas, products, items in the UnitedMetas Metaverse. The more Metavie Tokens you have, the higher are the advantages. UnitedMetas is a multi metaverse, which starts with a DeFi oriented metaverse and brings users closer to the experience of all DeFi or NFT related products - first 2D, then 3D and VR. The goal is to educate them through game-like elements.
